sentence: Mike Brown, of Stevensville; Norton Shores businesswoman Tudor Dixon; Oakland County "quality guru" and businessman Perry Johnson; Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley; Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey; Rebandt; Bloomfield Hills businessman Kevin Rinke; and Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Paul Egan
title: Higher education funding highlights divisions among GOP candidates for governor at debate
